description: Parenting is a journey of guiding the next generation. It's about providing love, support, and structure while allowing children to grow into their own unique selves.
sentences: Consistency in rules and discipline is crucial for children.
Create a safe and loving environment where they feel secure.
Prioritize quality time over expensive gifts.
Listen to your children and validate their feelings.
Be a good role model; they learn more from what you do than what you say.
dos: Teach them about consent and boundaries from a young age.
donts: Don't compare your child to other children.
Avoid over-scheduling them with too many activities.
Don't use threats or bribes for discipline.
Don't ignore your own well-being; you can't pour from an empty cup.
